meta.title: Noretmy - Your Freelance Services Marketplace
meta.description: Noretmy is a professional gig marketplace where businesses connect with top freelancers to get digital services, custom solutions, and project-based work done efficiently and affordably.

heroSection.subheadline: Connect with verified professionals who deliver exceptional results.

problemSolution.description: We've reimagined the freelance experience. Our platform connects you with verified professionals who deliver results, backed by enterprise-grade security.

howItWorks.headline: How it works
howItWorks.description: Get started in minutes. Our streamlined process makes finding and hiring talent effortless.

search.title: Search & Discover
search.description: Browse our curated marketplace of verified professionals. Filter by expertise, ratings, and budget.

connect.title: Connect & Discuss
connect.description: Chat directly with sellers to discuss project requirements and receive tailored proposals.

payment.title: Secure Payment
payment.description: Pay safely through our escrow system. Funds are released only after you approve the work.

receive.title: Receive & Review
receive.description: Get your project delivered on time. Request revisions if needed until fully satisfied.

howItWorks.noCreditCard: No credit card required • Free to browse

finalCTA.headline: Ready to get started?
finalCTA.description: Join thousands of businesses finding top talent on our platform. Create your free account today.

slides.description: Whether you're a freelancer or a company, scale your work or teams at your pace, with complete freedom.

header.title: What Our Clients Say
header.subtitle: Real stories from real businesses who found success with our expert freelancers

items.name: Liam Carter
items.description: Working with Noretmy was a game-changer. They built us a fast, scalable platform that exceeded expectations and helped our brand stand out in a crowded market.

items.name: Daniel Clarke
items.description: From idea to execution, Noretmy was with us every step of the way. Their design thinking and technical skills turned our platform into a sleek, powerful product.

items.name: Ethan Brooks
items.description: Thanks to Noretmy, we now have a custom data dashboard that gives us real-time insights and helps our team make smarter, faster decisions.

items.name: James Walker
items.description: Noretmy's generative AI integration boosted our content automation process and helped us reduce manual work by over 60%—absolutely incredible!

items.name: Oliver Scott
items.description: The Noretmy team delivered quality work on a tight schedule. Their component-driven approach made our frontend development smooth and maintainable.

header.title: Take Your Services Listing to the Next Level
header.subtitle: Stand out in a competitive marketplace and connect with premium clients using our powerful promotion tools

whyPromote.title: Why Promote Your Gig?
whyPromote.description: Freelancers who use promotional tools are <highlight>5x more likely</highlight> to receive orders in their first week. Boost your visibility, stand out in search results, and attract high-quality clients.

testimonial.name: Alex Walker
testimonial.quote: After promoting my web development gig, I saw immediate results. My profile views increased by <highlight>200%</highlight> and I received multiple inquiries within 48 hours. The promotion paid for itself with my first order.

header.title: How Companies Thrive With Us
header.subtitle: Here's how businesses succeeded after switching to our custom services.

slides.description: Implemented an AI system to tailor user experiences with real-time recommendations. This increased relevance and engagement across the platform.
Integrated AI into FindxStorage, optimizing unit selection by analyzing customer behavior, leading to increased user satisfaction.
Implemented AI on Have a Seat, tailoring restaurant suggestions based on user preferences, enhancing booking efficiency.
Leveraged AI for Have a Seat to deliver dynamic dining recommendations, boosting user interaction and simplifying the reservation process.
